mapper.insert: insert into t_report (sub_id, report_type, id, report_subtime, report_state, report_version, report_file, report_content, stu_message, tea_suggestion) values (#{subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reportState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportVersion,jdbcType=REAL}, #{reportFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{stuMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{teaSuggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_report
sub_id = #{record.subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_type = #{record.reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_subtime = #{record.reportSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
report_state = #{record.reportState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_version = #{record.reportVersion,jdbcType=REAL},

update t_report set sub_id = #{record.subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_type = #{record.reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_subtime = #{record.reportSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, report_state = #{record.reportState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_version = #{record.reportVersion,jdbcType=REAL}, report_file = #{record.reportFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_report
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_subtime = #{reportSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
report_state = #{reportState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_version = #{reportVersion,jdbcType=REAL},
report_file = #{reportFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_content = #{reportContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
stu_message = #{stuMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
tea_suggestion = #{teaSuggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where sub_id = #{subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and report_type = #{reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_report set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_subtime = #{reportSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, report_state = #{reportState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_version = #{reportVersion,jdbcType=REAL}, report_file = #{reportFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, report_content = #{reportContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, stu_message = #{stuMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, tea_suggestion = #{teaSuggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where sub_id = #{subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and report_type = #{reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach:
update t_report
report_type=#{item.reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
id=#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_subtime=#{item.reportSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
report_state=#{item.reportState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
report_version=#{item.reportVersion,jdbcType=REAL},
report_file=#{item.reportFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
report_content=#{item.reportContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
stu_message=#{item.stuMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
tea_suggestion=#{item.teaSuggestion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where sub_id = #{item.subId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} report_type = #{item.reportType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
